For those on the list interested in applying ANNs to image processing
tasks, such as OCR and image enhancement, I came across an excellence
paper published in 2002 in the journal Pattern Recognition:

http://www.cs.uu.nl/people/michael/Abstract-PR01.htm

It's an overview of ANNs applied to imaging domains, with a very nice
list of resources.
